code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"../styles/Stocks.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Stocks(){const[stockId,setStockId]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const fetchStock=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("/api/stocks/".concat(stockId));const data=await response.json();setResult(data);}catch(error){setResult({error:"No se pudo obtener la información del stock."});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stocks-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"stocks-title",children:"Selecciona tu Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stocks-input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"stocks-input",value:stockId,onChange:e=>setStockId(e.target.value),placeholder:"ID del Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"stocks-button",onClick:fetchStock,children:"Consultar"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stocks-result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Resultado:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})]})]});}export default Stocks;
